description:
In this course ' Law Of Attraction- Manifest What You Want Using Your Emotion' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

How to help you manifest and achieve what you want simply by managing your emotions. In this course, you will learn what are those negative emotions can trigger unfortunate manifestation and how to heal with them.

You will learn about 10 different types of negative emotions that block your manifestation power thus limiting your ability to achieve things you want to achieve in your life. You will also learn how to identify whether or not you have these negative emotions.

You will learn about 8 positive emotions for manifesting. These positive emotions will help you increase your manifestation power and achieve things in your life easily.

You will also learn powerful relaxation and confidence anchoring techniques to relax instantly and also gain confidence.

This course is for everyone who wants to be very successful in their life and achieve their goals using powerful law of attraction techniques and manifestations.

This course is in English and contains more than 7 live recorded lectures and a bonus e-book on affirmations.
title: Law Of Attraction- Manifest What You Want Using Your Emotion
